reviewText: This is a pretty good video for anyone needing ideas for craft projects, ideas that pertain to different cultures (only three, however). The construction techniques are easy to follow, both verbally and visually, and the results are colorful, invite variation, and are easy to achieve. In addition, you'll probably think up related ideas on your own. However, it's only about craft-work and not a true discussion or explanation of multicultural arts. I think it would be more helpful in a classroom if the cultures mentioned can be explored and expanded upon by students in another capacity besides "art."
